title: Adobe hit with proposed class-action, accused of misusing authors’ work in AI training
description: The lawsuit is just the latest in a string of copyright-related legal complaints aimed at the AI industry.
content: The lawsuit is just the latest in a string of copyright-related legal complaints aimed at the AI industry.
